author: kameshj
msg: to ensure the merge from a feature branch does not readd the file which got
deleted in trunk already(Case of not up-to-date feature branch).

author: kameshj
msg: Add a testcase to confirm reflective revision detection respects the
target@peg_rev i.e not confused by some unrelated url with a same name
as target url in a requested merge range.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Make SVN_SLEEP_FOR_TIMESTAMPS always available, but under a 'scary' name:
This permits 'release' builds to run the test suite far faster (48mins down to
(SVN_SLEEP_ENV_VAR): define what our new name is.
(svn_sleep_for_timestamps): Remove SVN_DEBUG ifdef; also flip meaning
(no_sleep_for_timestamps, do_sleep_for_timestamps): Update to new name and
flip the meaning of the value per above.
